Name: Verify Successful Logout from Jira Secure Dashboard
Description: Navigate to the Jira login page and log in to access the secure dashboard. Perform actions such as inputting a summary, assigning a task, and logging out. Verify successful logout from the secure dashboard.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to http://a7e83065db3ac4594bd4a156c4074484-1448992209.us-east-2.elb.amazonaws.com/jira/login.jsp
Step 2: Login -> Navigate to page 'jira/secure/Dashboard.jspa'
Step 3: Enter input value in input field 'summary'
Step 4: Click on rich
Step 5: Click on button 'assign-to-me-trigger' -> Navigate to page 'jira/logoutconfirm.jsp'
Step 6: Click on input field 'Logout' -> Navigate to page 'jira/secure/Logout.jspa'
Step 7: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Verify Successful Logout from Jira Secure Edit Issue
Description: Navigate to the Jira login page and log in to access the secure edit issue page. Input a summary, update an issue, and log out. Verify successful logout from the secure edit issue page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to http://a7e83065db3ac4594bd4a156c4074484-1448992209.us-east-2.elb.amazonaws.com/jira/login.jsp
Step 2: Login -> Navigate to page 'jira/secure/EditIssue!default.jspa'
Step 3: Enter input value in input field 'summary'
Step 4: Click on rich
Step 5: Click on button 'Update' -> Navigate to page 'jira/logoutconfirm.jsp'
Step 6: Click on input field 'Logout' -> Navigate to page 'jira/secure/Logout.jspa'
Step 7: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
